title: Ceiling Fans, Fire Pit Lounge, Picnic Area with BBQ, Spacious Kitchen*
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1140 Sq.
Colton Apartments represent the ultimate expression of Henderson, Nevada’s unique and adventurous spirit.
Designed to delight, this apartment community offers a world of simple sophistication, framed with endlessly fascinating views of boundless blue skies and majestic mountains.

Nestled at the crossroads of the Sloan Canyon National Conservation Area and Lake Mead, residents enjoy access to the area’s abundant recreational activities like hiking, biking, boating, rock climbing, and horseback riding.
Come discover large and pet-friendly one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes.
Visualize better living as you relax in the tranquil heated spa, exceed your health goals in the fitness center, and enjoy meals with friends and family as you BBQ in the picnic area.
Every apartment home features a complete appliance package, a private balcony or patio, and an in-home washer/dryer.
Discover better living at Colton Apartments.
*Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time
Pets are welcome but limited to two per unit.
Please note that residents will be required to pay a $350 initial pet fee, along with a $150 deposit.
Additionally, monthly rent increases by $45 for those with pets.
Please see leasing office for details.
